definition[0]: a disadvantage of a situation, plan, product etc
example[0]: It’s a great city – the only drawback is the weather.
example[1]: The main drawback to these products is that they tend to be too salty.
definition[1]: a disadvantage of a situation, product etc that makes it less attractive
example[2]: There are drawbacks to being a sole trader, but they are outweighed by the benefits.
example[3]: one of the main drawbacks of the scheme
